metadata.title: CVE-2023-42950 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: [Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary codeexecution]

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
